Sql.query: insert into cpa_total_transmisoresdet ( cpattdcodi, cpattcodi, emprcodi, cpattdtotmes01, cpattdtotmes02, cpattdtotmes03, cpattdtotmes04, cpattdtotmes05, cpattdtotmes06, cpattdtotmes07, cpattdtotmes08, cpattdtotmes09, cpattdtotmes10, cpattdtotmes11, cpattdtotmes12, cpattdusucreacion, cpattdfeccreacion ) values ( :cpattdcodi, :cpattcodi, :emprcodi, :cpattdtotmes01, :cpattdtotmes02, :cpattdtotmes03, :cpattdtotmes04, :cpattdtotmes05, :cpattdtotmes06, :cpattdtotmes07, :cpattdtotmes08, :cpattdtotmes09, :cpattdtotmes10, :cpattdtotmes11, :cpattdtotmes12, :cpattdusucreacion, :cpattdfeccreacion )

select cpattdcodi, cpattcodi, emprcodi, cpattdtotmes01, cpattdtotmes02, cpattdtotmes03, cpattdtotmes04, cpattdtotmes05, cpattdtotmes06, cpattdtotmes07, cpattdtotmes08, cpattdtotmes09, cpattdtotmes10, cpattdtotmes11, cpattdtotmes12, cpattdusucreacion, cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_total_transmisoresdet order by cpattdcodi asc

select cpattdcodi, cpattcodi, emprcodi, cpattdtotmes01, cpattdtotmes02, cpattdtotmes03, cpattdtotmes04, cpattdtotmes05, cpattdtotmes06, cpattdtotmes07, cpattdtotmes08, cpattdtotmes09, cpattdtotmes10, cpattdtotmes11, cpattdtotmes12, cpattdusucreacion, cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_total_transmisoresdet where cpattdcodi = :cpattdcodi

select distinct tradet.cpattdcodi, tradet.cpattcodi, tradet.emprcodi, tradet.cpattdtotmes01, tradet.cpattdtotmes02, tradet.cpattdtotmes03, tradet.cpattdtotmes04, tradet.cpattdtotmes05, tradet.cpattdtotmes06, tradet.cpattdtotmes07, tradet.cpattdtotmes08, tradet.cpattdtotmes09, tradet.cpattdtotmes10, tradet.cpattdtotmes11, tradet.cpattdtotmes12, tradet.cpattdusucreacion, tradet.cpattdfeccreacion, siem.emprnomb from cpa_empresa cpaemp left join si_empresa siem on (cpaemp.emprcodi = siem.emprcodi) left join cpa_total_transmisoresdet tradet on (cpaemp.emprcodi = tradet.emprcodi) where tradet.cpattcodi = {0} and cpaemp.cpaemptipo = 'T' and cpaemp.cpaempestado = 'A' order by siem.emprnomb

select siem.emprcodi, trim(siem.emprnomb) as emprnomb, tradet.cpattdcodi, tradet.cpattcodi, tradet.cpattdtotmes01, tradet.cpattdtotmes02, tradet.cpattdtotmes03, tradet.cpattdtotmes04, tradet.cpattdtotmes05, tradet.cpattdtotmes06, tradet.cpattdtotmes07, tradet.cpattdtotmes08, tradet.cpattdtotmes09, tradet.cpattdtotmes10, tradet.cpattdtotmes11, tradet.cpattdtotmes12, tradet.cpattdusucreacion, tradet.cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_empresa cpaemp join si_empresa siem on (cpaemp.emprcodi = siem.emprcodi) left join cpa_total_transmisores tra on (cpaemp.cparcodi = tra.cparcodi and tra.cpattcodi = (select max(cpattcodi) from cpa_total_transmisores where cparcodi = {0})) left join cpa_total_transmisoresdet tradet on (tradet.cpattcodi = tra.cpattcodi and cpaemp.emprcodi = tradet.emprcodi) where cpaemp.cparcodi = {0} and cpaemp.cpaemptipo = 'T' and cpaemp.cpaempestado = 'A' order by siem.emprnomb

select distinct null cpattdcodi, null cpattcodi, cpaemp.emprcodi, siem.emprnomb, null cpattdtotmes01, null cpattdtotmes02, null cpattdtotmes03, null cpattdtotmes04, null cpattdtotmes05, null cpattdtotmes06, null cpattdtotmes07, null cpattdtotmes08, null cpattdtotmes09, null cpattdtotmes10, null cpattdtotmes11, null cpattdtotmes12, null cpattdusucreacion, null cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_empresa cpaemp inner join si_empresa siem on (cpaemp.emprcodi = siem.emprcodi) where cpaemp.cparcodi = {0} and cpaemp.cpaemptipo = 'T' and cpaemp.cpaempestado = 'A' order by siem.emprnomb

select emp.emprcodi, emp.emprnomb, t.cparcodi, td.cpattdcodi, td.cpattcodi, td.cpattdtotmes01, td.cpattdtotmes02, td.cpattdtotmes03, td.cpattdtotmes04, td.cpattdtotmes05, td.cpattdtotmes06, td.cpattdtotmes07, td.cpattdtotmes08, td.cpattdtotmes09, td.cpattdtotmes10, td.cpattdtotmes11, td.cpattdtotmes12, case when td.cpattdtotmes01 is null and td.cpattdtotmes02 is null and td.cpattdtotmes03 is null and td.cpattdtotmes04 is null and td.cpattdtotmes05 is null and td.cpattdtotmes06 is null and td.cpattdtotmes07 is null and td.cpattdtotmes08 is null and td.cpattdtotmes09 is null and td.cpattdtotmes10 is null and td.cpattdtotmes11 is null and td.cpattdtotmes12 is null then null else coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes01, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes02, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes03, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes04, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes05, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes06, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes07, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes08, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes09, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes10, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes11, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes12, 0) end as cpattdtotal, td.cpattdusucreacion, td.cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_total_transmisores t inner join cpa_total_transmisoresdet td on td.cpattcodi = t.cpattcodi inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = td.emprcodi where t.cpattcodi = (select max(tt.cpattcodi) from cpa_total_transmisores tt where tt.cparcodi = {0}) order by emp.emprcodi

select emp.emprcodi, emp.emprnomb, t.cparcodi, td.cpattdcodi, td.cpattcodi, td.cpattdtotmes01, td.cpattdtotmes02, td.cpattdtotmes03, td.cpattdtotmes04, td.cpattdtotmes05, td.cpattdtotmes06, td.cpattdtotmes07, td.cpattdtotmes08, td.cpattdtotmes09, td.cpattdtotmes10, td.cpattdtotmes11, td.cpattdtotmes12, case when td.cpattdtotmes01 is null and td.cpattdtotmes02 is null and td.cpattdtotmes03 is null and td.cpattdtotmes04 is null and td.cpattdtotmes05 is null and td.cpattdtotmes06 is null and td.cpattdtotmes07 is null and td.cpattdtotmes08 is null and td.cpattdtotmes09 is null and td.cpattdtotmes10 is null and td.cpattdtotmes11 is null and td.cpattdtotmes12 is null then null else coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes01, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes02, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes03, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes04, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes05, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes06, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes07, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes08, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes09, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes10, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes11, 0) + coalesce(td.cpattdtotmes12, 0) end as cpattdtotal, td.cpattdusucreacion, td.cpattdfeccreacion from cpa_total_transmisores t inner join cpa_total_transmisoresdet td on td.cpattcodi = t.cpattcodi inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = td.emprcodi where t.cpattcodi = {0} order by emp.emprcodi
